title: Geometric Square font
content:
I'm looking to reproduce a logo which includes this text for a client but am not having any luck finding this font. Has anybody seen it around?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-15%20at%2012_4189.05.25%20PM.png)

Font: 

 Falcons Font 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121103/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-10-15 at 12.05.25 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121103/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-15%20at%2012.05.25%20PM.png) | 85.42 KB |
author: kvnrangel

comments.content:
You can try ... **[Falcons Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317121103/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-3%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=FalconsFont%20-%20Regular&fid=723f7775b4ba585b0671098affa33496&fsize=60&text=FALCONS&fit=1)**.  
It's a free font by Atlanta Falcons
Wow! Didn't realize it would be that obvious! Thanks for your help!
